column4: Outer loop New Circle Rd at Versailles Rd
column5: The exit ramp (Exit 5B) to outbound/westbound Versailles Rd is shutdown due to a semi that struck an embankment and leaked diesel fuel.

column4: Alexandria Dr at Our Native Ln
column5: Outbound Alexandria Dr is shutdown near the RR tracks.  Inbound Alexandria Dr is shutdown at Old Frankfort Pike.  Single vehicle injury collision.

column4: Outbound Richmond Rd at Old Richmond Rd
column5: The left lane is blocked just prior to the intersection.

column4: Inbound S Limestone at Huguelet Dr
column5: The right lane is blocked at the intersection.
